rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: A welcoming entrance hall that adheres to Vastu principles by aligning the main door in the east, ensuring positive energy and balance.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: A spacious open-plan living area combined with an integrated kitchen. The design includes ample natural light and ventilation as per Mediterranean style aesthetics, with Vastu considerations for south-east placement.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: An area adjacent to the living room, ideal for casual dining and social gatherings. Placement adheres to local norms with a focus on harmony.

rooms.name: Servants' Quarters
rooms.description: Compact, efficient space designated for household staff. Positioned strategically to maintain privacy while following local residential norms.

rooms.name: Swimming Pool Area
rooms.description: A modern swimming pool area integrated into the landscape design, ensuring a seamless transition between indoor and outdoor spaces. The pool is located towards the west to adhere to Vastu guidelines.

openings.name: Main Entrance
openings.description: The main entrance door is designed to welcome positive energy in accordance with Vastu principles and Mediterranean aesthetics.

openings.name: Window - Living Room & Kitchen
openings.description: Large windows ensure ample natural light for the open-plan kitchen and living area, enhancing both functionality and ambiance.

openings.name: Service Entrance
openings.description: A discreet service entrance leading to the servants' quarters, ensuring privacy and ease of access for staff.
